Dracona smiled... "great, we needed members..the radicons looked at each ot=
her angily....with one punch Scamrock knocked down Arrow, but dracona stopp=
ed the fight quickly......Dracona pointed out the secrets of the base to Wr=
ath and Kamodia, like the secret passagewaay and stuff.....
  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:15 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Wrath and=
 Kamodia begin walking around looking at all the CR Chamber's and Computer'=
s* Kamodia: Well, I seem to like it. Wrath: It didn't take us too long to g=
et in here. *They both turned to Dracona* Kamodia: I wish to join. Wrath: C=
ount me in for that.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
 =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 5:30 PM
    Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "yes, you can join us, the People's Group!...=
" Dracona said..... "come on, we'll show you, but promise not to ever let t=
his slip out......" Dracona said.....Dracona put a blindfold on Wrath and K=
amodia and (with Orchid's permission only, if Orchid doesn't like this then=
 it doesn't have to happen, just wanted to quicken things...) took them thr=
ough the secret passageway..... "thiss is the base....it's all underground.=
..." Dracona said, removing the blindfolds from Wrath and Kamodia.....
    =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:36 AM
      Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


      *Wrath and Kamodia turned to look* Wrath: Do you k=
now where we can get a job? *Wrath asked to Dracona* *Wrath said as he and =
Kamodia walked up to Dracona* *Kamodia smiled as she got her wish of meetin=
g some more bots*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECO=
DE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:2=
4 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Dracona and company fini=
she repairing all except for suukie, wgo was injured too bad and would take=
 a long time to repair..Plintissa, much to Dracona's anger, had forgotten a=
bout their mission and stayed to talk to Suukie....the Radicons and Dracona=
 came from the secret passage way when nobody could possibly see, and walke=
d off searching for some members......the Radicons bickered among themselve=
s and Dracona studied the landscape..Dracona saw Wrath and Kamodia.. "hey, =
you 2, over here!..." Dracona said, calling out Wrath and Kamodia......the =
Radicons drew their blasters and stood guard, Scamrock laughed and played w=
ith his thumbs......Dracona showed her hands empty to show that she came in=
 peace....she waved to Wrath and Kamodia.....
          ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
          Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 9:12 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


          *Kamodia thought she saw something for a minute but =
figures its all in her mond continues walking on*
            ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
            Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:43 AM
            Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


            Plintissa looks in the distance and spots Wr=
ath and Kamodia....Plintissa knows the would be good for the People's Group=
, but no wway she could invite them with these idiot Truths surrounding her=
!......she ushers to Wrath and Kamodia, hoping they'll see......
          =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
    =
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 =
2:15 AM
              Subject: Neo Beast Wars


              *Wrath and Ka=
modia still stand on the outside of the Maximal base* Wrath: HEEEEYYYY!! WE=
 WANT A JOB!!! *Wrath yells at the top of his lungs* *Than he notices Kamod=
ia walking away* Wrath: Where are you going? Kamodia: I'm not sticking arou=
nd here when they don't want us. Wrath: How do you know that they don't? Ka=
modia: If they really wanted us than they'd answer us. *Kamodia turns and w=
alks on looking for another base* *Wrath stands there thinking about what K=
omodia said and comes to the fact that she's right* Wrath: Hey wait up! *Wr=
ath comes running up and catches up with Kamodia* Kamodia: What made you le=
ave? *She says giving off a sly grin* Wrath: I came to the fact that I'm to=
o good for that dump. Kamodia: Come on, admit it! I'm right. If they really=
 wanted us then they would've answered us. *Wrath doesn't answer and keeps =
looking foward* Kamodia: Your just mad because you know I'm right but you a=
re right about that place being a dump. *They contiue walking on*
